text: Lech Andrzej Janerka (born 2 May 1953 in Wrocław, Poland) is a Polish songwriter, vocalist, and bassist. In the 1980s he was leader of a notable Polish post-punk/new wave band called Klaus Mitffoch, based in Wrocław. == Discography == ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
